issue.title: com.xunmeng.pinduoduo

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://cd.pddpic.com/volantis-open/mobile-CI-tag/2025-03-05/6a501cab90bdbb7c400a98184b54f225.apk

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

上面的下载链接是一个叫做“拼多多”的软件，英文名叫做“temu”下面两个域名建议禁止，应该将下面的两个域名添加到Adguard DNS过滤器
ta.pinduoduo.com
th.pinduoduo.com
下面三条规则建议添加到Adguard防跟踪过滤器，你们再看一下图，图中的url是软件为了绕过规则，所以使用IP，我就用这三条规则拦截，目前软件没有异常。url内容中可以看出会上传版本号等等信息，这侵犯隐私，我觉得应该禁止。为了避免以后IP更改导致规则失效，规则应该不包含IP。
||*d4?appid*type*
||*/d?id=*type*
||*/d?dn=*&id*&type=*

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/daf635be-04c5-4e31-b231-f2f0b5e6e061)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/25762a81-5f43-4527-87f4-45204f05dccb)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9243ab92-d73e-4f77-8fe7-42e26c99d8cc)

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: App built for an older Android and does not have enabled latest privacy options of Android. Added rules.

`@@||akyapitv.idealdata.com.tr^$stealth=dpi`

Site requires an account and not seeing a register button (and according to forget passwort form it requires a mobile number too).

ta.pinduoduo.com
th.pinduoduo.com
下面三条规则建议添加到Adguard防跟踪过滤器，你们再看一下图，图中的url是软件为了绕过规则，所以使用IP，我就用这三条规则拦截，目前软件没有异常。url内容中可以看出会上传版本号等等信息，这侵犯隐私，我觉得应该禁止。为了避免以后IP更改导致规则失效，规则应该不包含IP。
||*d4?appid*type*
||*/d?id=*type*
||*/d?dn=*&id*&type=*

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: kaliscan.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://kaliscan.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fkaliscan.com%2F) ### Comment > I've already repported this issue, it had number kaliscan.com #198059 > https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198059#issuecomment-2647552000 > It was marked as fixed, but unfortunately the problem still occures and does not seem to be fixed. It appears not with all the clicks how it previously was, sometimes redirections gets blocked, but I still get a lot of redirections to the ads websites (the second screenshot) when clicking somewhere on the page (clicks on links, clicks on the background, even scrolling with clicking the mouse, basically anywhere). > Ad guard successfully blocked all the redirections and ads previously, so I'm confused with this one. Probably just stop using the website if it's impossible to fix the problem. > Thanks in advance for your work > > Here is the previous issue description: > started ocasionaly get the unblocked ads on the next website (where the ads never appeared before) and the most irritating - now I'm getting redirections after random clicks on the website page, which also never occured before. Redirections are blocked in browser settings also, so I have no idea why that started occuring ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://kaliscan.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fkaliscan.com%2F) ### Comment > I've already repported this issue, it had number kaliscan.com #198059 > https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198059#issuecomment-2647552000 > It was marked as fixed, but unfortunately the problem still occures and does not seem to be fixed. It appears not with all the clicks how it previously was, sometimes redirections gets blocked, but I still get a lot of redirections to the ads websites (the second screenshot) when clicking somewhere on the page (clicks on links, clicks on the background, even scrolling with clicking the mouse, basically anywhere). > Ad guard successfully blocked all the redirections and ads previously, so I'm confused with this one. Probably just stop using the website if it's impossible to fix the problem. > Thanks in advance for your work > > Here is the previous issue description: > started ocasionaly get the unblocked ads on the next website (where the ads never appeared before) and the most irritating - now I'm getting redirections after random clicks on the website page, which also never occured before. Redirections are blocked in browser settings also, so I have no idea why that started occuring ### Screenshots

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body: Fixed, update should be available soon. However, please read [the first post](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/200641#issue-2913812002).

An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://p.lumex.space](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fp.lumex.space)
### Comment
> Lumex is not a malicious site, but recently (from March 7-8?) it is blocked by a standard AdGuard's public resolver. A non-filtering resolver returns the current IP addresses.
> 
> > kdig `@94.140.14.14` +https +short p.lumex.space
> 0.0.0.0
> > kdig `@94.140.14.140` +https +short p.lumex.space
> 172.67.158.112
> 104.21.65.53
>

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
